column4: I've followed the steps at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu to add the Medibuntu repository to Ubuntu
but I still can't see the java runtime in the Ubuntu Software Centre
you might try sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
well I don't see sun-java6-jre in the repository but I gave you a name that did install java and other good stuf sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
